Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu

Na mkparịtaụka ya na BBC Igbo mere Maazị Victor Umeh bụbu onyeisi patị All Progressives Grand Alliance (APGA) kwuru maka mkamkpa niile na-akpa na Naịjirịa ugbua ọkachasị etu o siri metụta agbụrụ ndị na-achọ oke ha.
O kwukwara etu gọọmentị Naịjirịa ga-esi kwụsị mkpamkpa a niile.
Gee ntị n'okwu ya.
Vidio, Victor Umeh: Lee ihe ndị ọchịchị anyị kwesịrị ime ka udo na ọganihu bata Naijirịa, Duration 8,39elekere 4 gara aga
